meanings.definition: A label bearing the owner's name and often a design, pasted usually on the inside cover of a book.
meanings.sent1: I found a beautiful bookplate inside the cover of my favorite novel.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed her personalized bookplate in all her books.
meanings.sent3: The bookplate in the library book had a funny picture of a dancing cat.
meanings.sent4: Her bookplate was like a tiny piece of art hidden within the pages.
meanings.sent5: The bookplate with the golden border made the book feel special.

meanings.sent1: I will bookplate my entire collection of novels this weekend.
meanings.sent2: He bookplates his books to ensure they are easily recognizable.
meanings.sent3: She decided to bookplate her notebooks with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent4: The author's signature bookplated the first edition copies.
meanings.sent5: Bookplating each book made them feel like treasures.
